subzone-population.title: Subzone Population
subzone-population.instructions: Guess which subzone of Singapore has the higher population.

mrt-latitude.title: MRT Stations (Latitude)
mrt-latitude.instructions: Guess which MRT station is further north (higher latitude).

mrt-longitude.title: MRT Stations (Longitude)
mrt-longitude.instructions: Guess which MRT station is further east (higher longitude).

malls-latitude.title: Malls (Latitude)
malls-latitude.instructions: Guess which mall is further north (higher latitude).

malls-longitude.title: Malls (Longitude)
malls-longitude.instructions: Guess which mall is further east (higher longitude).

malls-area.title: Malls (Area)
malls-area.instructions: Guess which mall has a larger net lettable area.

malls-stores.title: Malls (Stores)
malls-stores.instructions: Guess which mall has more stores.

malls-year.title: Malls (Year)
malls-year.instructions: Guess which mall's opening year comes later.
